text: Antonio Francisco Cafiero (September 12, 1922 - October 13, 2014) was an Argentine politician.Official website . He was the Governor of the Buenos Aires Province from 1987 through 1991. He was also its Senator from 1993 to 2005. Cafiero was born on September 12, 1922 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He studied at the University of Buenos Aires. Cafiero died on October 13, 2014 of pneumonia in Buenos Aires, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in Argentina Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Accountants
title: Antonio Cafiero
